languages.text: "Мон-кай не под силу укротить Лилэтан". {n}Ирлиэт шепчет яростно, не скрывая презрения.{/n} "На протяжении столетий человечекий род измывался над миром. Извращал его, стремясь изваять собственное бытие из уже совершенной планеты. Капризные и упрямые дети здесь только вы".

"The mon-keigh cannot tame the Lilaethan." {n}Yrliet's whisper is full of rage and undisguised contempt.{/n} "Your human breed have tortured this world for ages on end. Perverting it, trying to sculpt your own existence out of a planet that is already perfect. You are the only capricious and stubborn children here."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай не под силу укротить Лилэтан". {n}Ирлиэт шепчет яростно, не скрывая презрения.{/n} "На протяжении столетий человечекий род измывался над миром. Извращал его, стремясь изваять собственное бытие из уже совершенной планеты. Капризные и упрямые дети здесь только вы".

Perverting it, trying to sculpt your own existence out from a planet that is already perfect. You are the only capricious and stubborn children here."

Perverting it, trying to sculpt your own existence out of a planet that is already perfect. You are the only capricious and stubborn children here."

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイはリラエタンを制御できない」{n}ユリエットの囁きには怒りとあからさまな軽蔑が込められていた。{/n}「人間の種族は何世紀もの間、この世界を苦しめてきた。既に完璧な惑星を歪め、自分たちの存在を彫り出そうとしている。お前たちはただの気まぐれで頑固な子供なのだ」
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh cannot tame the Lilaethan." {n}Yrliet's whisper is full of rage and undisguised contempt.{/n} "Your human breed have tortured this world for ages on end. Perverting it, trying to sculpt your own existence out of a planet that is already perfect. You are the only capricious and stubborn children here."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイはリラエタンを制御できない」{n}ユリエットの囁きには怒りとあからさまな軽蔑が込められていた。{/n}「人間の種族は何世紀もの間、この世界を苦しめてきた。既に完璧な惑星を歪め、自分たちの存在を彫り出そうとしている。お前たちはただの気まぐれで頑固な子供なのだ」

languages.text: « Les mon-keigh ne peuvent pas dompter la lilaethan, {n}murmure Yrliet avec dédain et colère.{/n} Cela fait des siècles que les humains torturent ce monde. Vous tentez de pervertir cette planète pourtant parfaite, de la sculpter pour faciliter votre existence. C'est vous, les enfants capricieux et têtus ! »
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh cannot tame the Lilaethan." {n}Yrliet's whisper is full of rage and undisguised contempt.{/n} "Your human breed have tortured this world for ages on end. Perverting it, trying to sculpt your own existence out of a planet that is already perfect. You are the only capricious and stubborn children here."

traits.locale_text: « Les mon-keigh ne peuvent pas dompter la lilaethan, {n}murmure Yrliet avec dédain et colère.{/n} Cela fait des siècles que les humains torturent ce monde. Vous tentez de pervertir cette planète pourtant parfaite, de la sculpter pour faciliter votre existence. C'est vous, les enfants capricieux et têtus ! »

languages.text: “猴子是无法驯服莉莱赞的。”{n}伊莉耶特的低语充满了愤怒与毫不掩饰的蔑视。{/n}“你们人类已经折磨了这个世界很长时间。你们颠倒是非，打算在这颗本已完美无缺的行星上强调你们的存在。你们才是这颗行星任性又固执的孩子。”
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh cannot tame the Lilaethan." {n}Yrliet's whisper is full of rage and undisguised contempt.{/n} "Your human breed have tortured this world for ages on end. Perverting it, trying to sculpt your own existence out of a planet that is already perfect. You are the only capricious and stubborn children here."

traits.locale_text: “猴子是无法驯服莉莱赞的。”{n}伊莉耶特的低语充满了愤怒与毫不掩饰的蔑视。{/n}“你们人类已经折磨了这个世界很长时间。你们颠倒是非，打算在这颗本已完美无缺的行星上强调你们的存在。你们才是这颗行星任性又固执的孩子。”

languages.text: «Una mon-keigh no puede doblegar al Lilaethan». {n}El susurro de Yrliet está lleno de rabia y manifiesto desagrado.{/n} «Su calaña humana lleva siglos torturando este mundo. Pervirtiéndolo e intentando dejar su impronta en un planeta que ya era perfecto. La única niña caprichosa es usted».
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh cannot tame the Lilaethan." {n}Yrliet's whisper is full of rage and undisguised contempt.{/n} "Your human breed have tortured this world for ages on end. Perverting it, trying to sculpt your own existence out of a planet that is already perfect. You are the only capricious and stubborn children here."

traits.locale_text: «Una mon-keigh no puede doblegar al Lilaethan». {n}El susurro de Yrliet está lleno de rabia y manifiesto desagrado.{/n} «Su calaña humana lleva siglos torturando este mundo. Pervirtiéndolo e intentando dejar su impronta en un planeta que ya era perfecto. La única niña caprichosa es usted».

languages.text: "Die Chem-Pan-Sey kann die Lileath-Welt nicht zähmen." {n}Yrliets Flüstern ist voller Zorn und unverhohlener Verachtung.{/n} "Euer Menschenvolk hat diese Welt eine Ewigkeit lang gequält. Hat sie pervertiert, wollte einen bereits perfekten Planeten für Eure eigene Existenz umformen. Ihr seid hier die einzigen launenhaften und sturen Kinder."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh cannot tame the Lilaethan." {n}Yrliet's whisper is full of rage and undisguised contempt.{/n} "Your human breed have tortured this world for ages on end. Perverting it, trying to sculpt your own existence out of a planet that is already perfect. You are the only capricious and stubborn children here."

traits.locale_text: "Die Chem-Pan-Sey kann die Lileath-Welt nicht zähmen." {n}Yrliets Flüstern ist voller Zorn und unverhohlener Verachtung.{/n} "Euer Menschenvolk hat diese Welt eine Ewigkeit lang gequält. Hat sie pervertiert, wollte einen bereits perfekten Planeten für Eure eigene Existenz umformen. Ihr seid hier die einzigen launenhaften und sturen Kinder."

languages.text: "Mon-keigh, Lilaethan'ı ehlîleştiremez." {n}Yrliet, fısıldarken sesindeki öfke ve küçümsemeyi gizleme zahmetine girmiyor.{/n} "İnsan ırkınız bu dünyaya çağlar boyu işkence etti. Onu çarpıtmaya, varlığınızı zaten mükemmel olan bir gezegene yontarak yamamaya çalıştınız. Burada kaprisli ve inatçı bir çocuk varsa o da sizsiniz."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh cannot tame the Lilaethan." {n}Yrliet's whisper is full of rage and undisguised contempt.{/n} "Your human breed have tortured this world for ages on end. Perverting it, trying to sculpt your own existence out of a planet that is already perfect. You are the only capricious and stubborn children here."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh, Lilaethan'ı ehlîleştiremez." {n}Yrliet, fısıldarken sesindeki öfke ve küçümsemeyi gizleme zahmetine girmiyor.{/n} "İnsan ırkınız bu dünyaya çağlar boyu işkence etti. Onu çarpıtmak, kendi varlığınızı zaten mükemmel olan bir gezegene dayatmak istediniz. Burada kaprisli ve inatçı bir çocuk varsa o da sizsiniz."
